sentence: In early trading on Thursday, shares of Caterpillar topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 2.0%.
Year to date, Caterpillar registers a 29.9% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Merck, trading down 1.3%.
Merck is showing a gain of 18.3% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Johnson & Johnson, trading down 0.8%, and Home Depot, trading up 0.9% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
